Source: Matt Brown | Windows Central
We already have Xbox Game Pass for Console, for PC, and Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. Do we really need more? Here's why I think the answer to that is yes!

articles.content: A class action lawsuit against Apple will be allowed to go ahead after a judge certified the case on March 8 in California. The action focuses on the 2016-2019 MacBook Pro and 2018-2019 MacBook Air m… [+2212 chars]
